definition: to share the booty/to divide ill-gotten gains
corruption and abuse of the law (idiom); to take bribes and bend the law
(of a thief, smuggler etc) to be caught with stolen or illegal goods/to be caught red-handed
to order the return of stolen goods
to frame sb (by planting sth on them)
grasping officials, corrupt mandarins (idiom); abuse and corruption

sentences.english: At the touch of love everyone becomes a poet.
sentences.chinese: 贓羜每一個沐浴在愛河中的人都是詩人。

sentences.english: Love shouldn't fall in love with the people, but the helpless put not hand.
sentences.chinese: 贓羜愛着不該愛上的人，卻無可奈何的放不了手。

sentences.english: Having a calm smile to face with being disdained indicates kind of confidence.
sentences.chinese: 贓羜被輕蔑的時候能平靜的一笑，這是一種自信。

sentences.english: He claimed that the weapons had been planted on him.
sentences.chinese: 他稱道，那武器是別人給他栽的贓。

sentences.english: Time will never change and stop for any person.
sentences.chinese: 贓羜時間不給任何人情面，也不會爲誰而停留。

definition: to bring to justice/to punish according to the law
lots (to be drawn)/lot (in a game of chance)
to check/to examine/to inspect/to exercise restraint
to reject/to expel/to discard/to exclude/to renounce
(of a plot etc) to fall through and stand exposed
to bring to justice/to hand over to the law
to cheat/to swindle/to pretend/to feign/to draw sb out/to try to extract information by deceit or bluff
